TopicTitle: Yes, really an animation! Kerbal show Pre-season announcement.

Articles.Content:
So as you know, i've been working for about 4 months on a KSP 3d series.

Well, even though i had a bit of a setback last night. i was able to finish the render and get a video out.

So here you go.

[NOTE]: btw. the lipsync get's a bit worse after about 1:30 because i had to rush it.

[NOTE2] Also, sorry if the animation is kind of... edgy. it's a WIP thing

[NOTEPS]: Also. Yes. there is really a shadow casted on glass...

[NOTEPSS]: no, at 0:23 i'm saying slots... it was a first take..

Massive thanks to keanukeno21 here on the forums for the logo BTW.

Yes, i repeat myself alot in this. my and my friend were running out of time, so it was a first take.

Anywho. rules for it are simple.

1. Keep it [mildly] simple.

2. keep it within 1-3 minutes.

3. Keep in mind that you idea might be choses. but could come out in a different season.

4. any rocket parts shown will be from the Nova punch pack, or KSP 1.3.3.

5. The current sub-division level on the kerbals means that it can only support between 1-4 kerbals on camera. so that means if the scene requires more. they MAY get bumped down a sub-division level.

EDIT: send me a private message of your idea so i can easily find it.

And i know i missed a few head movements near the end. like i said, it was a rush-job.

Edited June 10, 2013 by rewdew2

Amazing idea! I can't wait!

I have an idea for an episode involving Kerbal Astronomy and Mythology. In the episode, the history of the Kerbolar System is explained, along with a rundown of Kerbal Mythology. The information used for the episode should probably come from the in-game Knowledge Base, and should include some information on the Kraken.

Just on a side note, I've actually created a spaceship which looks (and acts) like the Kraken.

Amazing idea! I can't wait!

I have an idea for an episode involving Kerbal Astronomy and Mythology. In the episode, the history of the Kerbolar System is explained, along with a rundown of Kerbal Mythology. The information used for the episode should probably come from the in-game Knowledge Base, and should include some information on the Kraken.

Just on a side note, I've actually created a spaceship which looks (and acts) like the Kraken.

Well, that's one idea. and the first idea.

At this rate. by the end of two months we should have....

over 150 to review in two days...

OH well.
One thing that drives me crazy. Can you make your Kerbal's Eyes derpy (lazy eyed, far apart)? It is SO annoying to see them like that.

One thing that drives me crazy. Can you make your Kerbal's Eyes derpy (lazy eyed, far apart)? It is SO annoying to see them like that.

Huh, it looks like those keyframes didn't get recorded. unless... HE'S PLOTTING TO KILL ME?!
Loved it that was some great work. looking forward to more of this
Great idea, the models need some polish but this could go somewhere. Approved and endorsed

Looking forword to this

Idea:have a look at what if there was war in the kerbol system thread lots of crazy kerbal things happen in there:D

An episode explaining Kerbal cloning technology might be fun or at least feature it in some way as part of an episode.

I have always wanted to see a Kerbal version of early flying machines something alone the lines of this video.

Maybe even in grainy black and white. I know you are limited in what parts you can use, so you can't make replicas, just something in the same spirit.

I don't know how long copy right last on songs, but "Those Magnificent Men in their Flying Machines" song would be perfect for it.

Well, as promised. at 10 subs i make the 'behind the scenes' episode.

That will be coming out next week. around friday or saturday (maybe sooner)

In the mean time. i've got some more... things to do.

I have an idea based on an unused script I wrote in about 10 minutes called "Lucky Charms". It was inspired by the frustration I had towards ASAS PID controller behaviour, and how a flight of mine kept falling apart because a single strut went missing. You're welcome to use all of it or parts of it, and edit it for your own purposes, as it was just an exercise in writing and venting so it's not that good. I've kept the last two pages since I don't want to give the story away. Here's page 1 (of 3) to see if you guys think it has any value. PM me if you want the whole thing... it's properly formatted script-wise in PDF, but posting here loses the formatting so I've had to approximate it.


INT. VAB - DAY
Two KERBALS are working on an ASAS MODULE while in the
background a recognizably Kerbal ROCKET is being assembled.
KERBAL ONE is holding and rotating the ASAS MODULE while
KERBAL TWO repeatedly hits it with a HAMMER. KERBAL TWO
pauses and looks at a VERY SCI-FI LOOKING DISPLAY, then hits
it a few more times with his hammer.[INDENT=3]
KERBAL TWO[/INDENT]
[INDENT=2][I]There! That should fix the
wobbling.
[/I][/INDENT]
[INDENT=3]
KERBAL ONE[/INDENT]
[INDENT=2][I]Yeah! Whiney pilots! I bet that if
they knew how much effort it really
took to make these sensitive
electronic components function, I
bet weÃ¢â‚¬â„¢d get less complaints and
more snacks.
[/I][/INDENT]
[INDENT=3]
KERBAL TWO[/INDENT]
[INDENT=2][I]I know, right?

[/I][/INDENT]
KERBAL TWO tosses his hammer over his shoulder, which hits a
JUNIOR SCIENTIST off in the distance who supervising the
ROCKET assembly and knocks him down. A WORKER comes by and
walks off with the ASAS MODULE.

[INDENT]
[/INDENT]


[INDENT=3]
KERBAL TWO (CONTÃ¢â‚¬â„¢D)[/INDENT]
[INDENT=2][I]So whatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s next on the list?

[/I][/INDENT]
[I]KERBAL ONE picks up his clipboard and flips the page, reading[/I]
slowly. In the background, the WORKER attaches the ASAS
MODULE to the UPPER STAGE.[INDENT=3]
KERBAL ONE[/INDENT]
[INDENT=2][I]That... that should be it.[/I]
[/INDENT]
[INDENT=3]
KERBAL TWO[/INDENT]
[INDENT=2][I]Sweet! Snack time! You going to
watch the launch?
[/I][/INDENT]
[I]
In the background the UPPER STAGE is attached to the rocket.[/I][INDENT=3]
KERBAL ONE[/INDENT]
[INDENT=2][I]Maybe. I donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t know. It seems like
weÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve had a string of bad luck lately.
One disaster after another.
[/I][/INDENT]
[INDENT=3](MORE)[/INDENT]

I think i should have at least 1 normal episode out before i do a -behind the scenes-
